doc:
Benson Fong https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benson_Fong 0 Benson Fong (traditional Chinese: 鄺炳雄; simplified Chinese: 邝炳雄; pinyin: Kuàng Bǐngxióng; October 10, 1916 – August 1, 1987) was an American character actor. Born in Sacramento, California, Fong was from a mercantile family. After graduating from high school in Sacramento, he studied briefly in China before returning to Sacramento and opening a grocery store with a cousin. Benson_Fong ( traditional_Chinese : 鄺炳雄 ; simplified_Chinese : 邝炳雄 ; pinyin : Kuàng_Bǐngxióng ; October_10_,_1916 – August_1_,_1987 ) was an_American_character_actor . Born in Sacramento , California , Fong was from a_mercantile_family . After graduating from high_school in Sacramento , he studied briefly in China before returning to Sacramento and opening a_grocery_store with a_cousin .
